definition: goodbye
to cut off somebody’s head, especially as a punishment
to cut off somebody’s head
to reduce the power of a group or organization by removing its leaders
to come together in a group
to gradually get more and more of something over a period of time
to gradually increase in number or quantity over a period of time
to collect something, especially in large quantities over a period of time
to come together as a group; to bring people or things together as a group
to fit together all the separate parts of something, for example a piece of furniture
a group of people who are gathered together in a church for a religious service, not including the priest and choir
a group of people who regularly attend a particular church
a group or collection of people, animals or things
a girl or a woman that somebody is having a romantic relationship with
a female friend
a man or boy that somebody has a romantic or sexual relationship with
a person who takes part in terrorism
the main meal of the day, eaten either in the middle of the day or in the evening
a large formal social gathering at which dinner is eaten
a thing that has been done badly
completely defeated
the last meal of the day, either a main meal, usually smaller and less formal than dinner, or a snack eaten before you go to bed

an icon (= a small symbol) associated with a website, that usually appears in the line near the top of a page on an internet browser where the address for that website is also displayed, or next to the site name in a list of bookmarks
a female person or animal that has already been mentioned or is easily identified
it (used to refer to something not usually thought of as female)
to give somebody official permission to do, own, or use something
a person, especially a man, who enjoys dressing in clothes usually worn by the opposite sex
a person who often wears clothes usually worn by people of the opposite sex
sexually attracted to people of more than one gender
having both male and female sexual organs
having characteristics of both the male and female sex or of neither sex in particular
having one form to represent male and female
a male sex hormone, for example testosterone
a hormone produced in women’s ovaries that causes them to develop the physical and sexual features that are characteristic of females and that causes them to prepare their body to have babies
a hormone produced in women’s ovaries that causes them to develop the physical and sexual features that are typical of females and that causes them to prepare their body to have babies
a soft substance that fills the hollow parts of bones
a large, long vegetable that grows on the ground. Marrows have dark green skin and are white inside.
the inner part of a nut or seed
the central, most important part of an idea or a subject
the most important or central part of something
the central part of an object
the hard central part of a fruit such as an apple, that contains the seeds
the muscles of the lower back and stomach area which help you to maintain good balance, etc.
a small group of people who take part in a particular activity
so that the whole of a thing or a person is affected
the middle point or part of something
the main part of a town or city where there are a lot of shops and offices
a place or an area where a lot of people live; a place where a lot of business or cultural activity takes place
a building or place used for a particular purpose or activity
a place where a particular kind of work is done extremely well
the point towards which people direct their attention
a moderate (= middle) political position or party, between the extremes of left-wing and right-wing parties
a player or position in the middle of the pitch, court, etc.
in or into the most important position
in all directions; everywhere
the most important quality or feature of something, that makes it what it is
a liquid taken from a plant, etc. that contains its smell and taste in a very strong form
necessary and very important
a thin rubber tube that a man wears over his penis during sex to stop a woman from becoming pregnant or to protect against disease
a thin rubber device that a woman wears inside her vagina during sex to prevent herself from becoming pregnant
done or used in order to prevent a disease
the physical activity of sex, usually describing the act of a man putting his penis inside a woman’s vagina
communication between people, countries, etc.
the act of having sex
sexual intercourse (= the physical activity of sex)
the passage in the body of a woman or female animal between the outer sex organs and the womb
the outer opening of the female sex organs
the small sensitive organ just above the opening of a woman’s vagina that becomes larger when she is sexually excited
a small round piece of metal, plastic, etc. that is sewn onto a piece of clothing and used for fastening two parts together
a small part of a machine that you press to make it work
a small area on a computer screen that you click on to make it do something
a badge, especially one with a message printed on it
intelligent and quick to understand
at exactly the right time or at the exact time mentioned
exactly right
to do exactly the right things to please somebody
to make somebody react in either a positive or a negative way
the tube that carries liquid waste out of the body. In men and male animals sperm also flows along this tube.
the small round part in the middle of the stomach, on the front of somebody's body, where the umbilical cord was cut at birth
the navel
a young human or animal before it is born, especially a human more than eight weeks after fertilization
a young human or animal before it is born, especially a human more than eight weeks after fertilization
an organ inside the uterus of a pregnant woman or animal to which the baby is attached and that is necessary to feed and protect the baby
used instead of someone in negative sentences and in questions after if/whether, and after verbs such as prevent, forbid, avoid, etc.
any person at all; it does not matter who
an important person
a pipe or tube carrying liquid, gas, electric or phone wires, etc.
a tube in the body or in plants through which liquid passes

used by people of many different countries
connected with or located on the outside of something/somebody
happening or coming from outside a place, an organization, your particular situation, etc.
coming from or arranged by somebody from outside a school, a university or an organization
connected with foreign countries
not in a room, building or container but on or to the outside of it
not inside a building
a country considered as a group of people with the same language, culture and history, who live in a particular area under one government
all the people in a country
a native North American people

to make a loud noise

used to show you are angry or surprised
to laugh so long and hard that there are tears in your eyes

used to describe a person who listens to your problems and gives you sympathy

to create or develop something
to become gradually stronger
(to have) plans or dreams that are not likely to happen or come true
used to say that a complicated task will take a long time and should not be rushed
to get involved in and try to influence a situation that should not really involve you, in a way that annoys other people

completely

to feel that something is not completely right, legal or honest, without having any proof; to not trust something
